dcterms:creator: A. Agarwal
A. Beygelzimer
M. Dudik
J. Langford
H. Wallach
dcterms:description: An extraction of the 2015 American Community Survey 5-year estimates containing demographic information about American census tracts, used to predict the percentage of children below the poverty line.
dcterms:title: US Census demographic data set

dcterms:description: Data from a pricing game organized by The French Institute of Actuaries in 2015, containing attributes related to motor insurance claims, used to predict average claim costs.
dcterms:title: Motor Insurance data set

dcterms:creator: D. Dua
C. Graff
dcterms:description: A dataset from the UCI Machine Learning Repository that includes various attributes related to crime in US communities, used to predict the number of violent crimes per population.
dcterms:title: Crime data set

dcterms:creator: J. Mary
C. Calauz`enes
N. E. Karoui
dcterms:description: A dataset used for fairness-aware learning that focuses on continuous attributes and treatments, providing a framework for assessing fairness in machine learning.
dcterms:title: Fairness-aware learning for continuous attributes and treatments (Mary2019)
